properties.name: Email
properties.description: Email to be displayed in case of warning or error messages

properties.name: CanonicalAllele
properties.description: Link to canonical allele collection - Example http://genboree.org/REST/v1/grp/{grp}/kb/{kb}/coll/{coll}

properties.name: EvidenceSource
properties.description: Link to evidence source collection - Example http://genboree.org/REST/v1/grp/{grp}/kb/{kb}/coll/{coll}. Information about guidelines, tags, transformation and project IDs are fetched from this collection

properties.name: CASourceLinks
properties.description: Link to the collection where the source links for the canonical allele are present. It is this information that is used in the top most panel of the calculator.

properties.name: GeneSourceLinks
properties.description: Link to the collection where the source links for the gene are present. It is this information that is used in the top most panel of the calculator.
